summary: Comprehensive testing of Privity Share Booking System completed successfully. Backend APIs working perfectly (22/23 tests passed). Frontend UI, new features (Dark Mode, User Management, Client Portfolio), navigation, mobile responsiveness, and role-based access control all functioning correctly. End-to-end testing shows excellent user experience.

minor_issues.issue: Test data cleanup failed in backend_test.py
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - only affects test cleanup

passed_tests: User registration and login flow working perfectly
Backend API comprehensive testing (22/23 tests passed)
Dashboard with all stats, charts, and analytics
NEW: Dark Mode toggle in sidebar and mobile header - working perfectly
NEW: User Management page (/users) - role-based access control working (visible only for admin roles 1-2)
NEW: Client Portfolio page (/clients/:id/portfolio) - accessible with proper components
Clients page with Portfolio button (PieChart icon) - properly integrated
All navigation pages accessible: Vendors, Stocks, Purchases, Inventory, Bookings, Reports
Navigation sidebar with all 8 items (Users hidden for non-admin users as expected)
Mobile navigation menu and theme toggle working
Role-based access control - Users menu properly hidden for Viewer role
ThemeProvider context working - seamless light/dark mode switching
Professional UI design with proper spacing and contrast
Reports page with filters and P&L analysis
